<Section size="1">

# Theme

Kookie UI is built on [Radix Themes](https://www.radix-ui.com/themes), providing a complete theming system that makes it easy to create consistent, accessible interfaces.

</Section>

<Separator size="4"/>

<Section size="1">

## Usage

The Theme component is the foundation of Kookie UI's styling system. It controls the visual appearance of all components through a set of configuration options:

<CodeBlock>

```jsx
<Theme
  accentColor="blue"
  grayColor="slate"
  appearance="light"
  radius="medium"
  scaling="100%"
  material="translucent"
>
  <YourApp />
</Theme>
```

</CodeBlock>

### Properties

- **accentColor** - Primary color for interactive elements (25+ options)
- **grayColor** - Secondary color for text and backgrounds (6 tinted options)
- **appearance** - Light, dark, or system preference
- **radius** - Border radius consistency (none, small, medium, large, full)
- **scaling** - Component size scaling (90% to 110%)
- **material** - Panel transparency (solid or translucent)

</Section>

<Separator size="4"/>

<Section size="1">

## Enhancements

While Kookie UI inherits Radix Themes' complete theming system, it includes several practical enhancements:

### Material
- **Clearer API** - Use `material` instead of `panelBackground` for more intuitive panel transparency control
- **Backward Compatible** - Existing `panelBackground` usage works with helpful migration warnings
- **Consistent Application** - All panels automatically respect your material setting

### Effects
- **Extended Blur Tokens** - 12-step blur scale for precise backdrop effects
- **Granular Opacity** - 9-step opacity scale for fine-tuned transparency
- **3D Button Effects** - Specialized tokens for realistic depth and elevation

### Typography
- **Pre-configured Fonts** - Inter and JetBrains Mono with proper fallbacks
- **Consistent Rendering** - Prevents browser font weight synthesis issues
- **Graceful Degradation** - Falls back to system fonts if custom fonts fail

</Section>

<Separator size="4"/>

<Section size="1">

## Tokens

Access theme values directly through CSS custom properties:

<CodeBlock>

```css
/* Color tokens */
var(--accent-9)           /* Primary accent color */
var(--gray-11)            /* High contrast text */
var(--color-background)   /* Page background */
var(--color-panel)        /* Panel background (auto-resolves) */

/* Spacing and sizing */
var(--space-4)            /* Standard spacing */
var(--radius-3)           /* Component border radius */
var(--font-size-3)        /* Text size */
```

</CodeBlock>

These tokens automatically respond to your theme configuration, ensuring consistency across your entire application.

</Section>

<Separator size="4"/>
